title: Monday blues for markets! Sensex falls 1,200 pts; these five stocks declined the most - Fortune India
content: Monday blues for markets! Sensex falls 1,200 pts; these five stocks declined the most  Fortune India
description: The BSE Sensex declined as much as 1,290 points to hit a low of 57,047 while the NSE Nifty fell as much as 347 points to 17,129.
